awards:
第38届马德普拉塔电影节(2023)
　　阿根廷竞赛单元 最佳短片奖(提名) 尼古拉斯·祖克菲尔德

director.name: 尼古拉斯·祖克菲尔德 Nicolás Zukerfeld

introduction: Agustín, a comic book illustrator, doesn’t want to continue drawing. Perhaps he’s a talentless man, or maybe he just doesn’t feel like it. One day he has a dream in which he barges in her ex-girlfriend’s place. That same day, he wants to prove if everything is still there, the way he left it.源自：https://www.mardelplatafilmfest.com/38/en/pelicula/una-habitacion-llena-de-polvo
